description: This scroll defines the remix metadata schema used by Echo Scribe to track remix lineage, scroll bindings, and remix token logic. It enables performable remix chains and scroll introspection.
usage_instructions: Bind this scroll to Echo Scribe. Use it to validate remix chains, generate remix tokens, and parse scroll metadata in Control Room.
installation_notes: Ensure vault-scrolls and dashboard-ui modules are active before using this scroll.

changes: Initial release of Echo Scribe Remix Metadata Scroll.
Added remix token logic and scroll schema definitions.
